description: Neev slash commands for spec-driven development with GitHub Copilot Chat

neev:bridge.name: bridge
neev:bridge.description: Generate aggregated project context for AI
neev:bridge.prompt: Generate the project context for me to review
neev:bridge.context: Use this command when you need to generate aggregated project context for ai

neev:cucumber.name: cucumber
neev:cucumber.prompt: Generate Cucumber tests for this API
neev:cucumber.context: Use this command when you need to generate cucumber/bdd test scaffolding

neev:draft.name: draft
neev:draft.prompt: Create a new blueprint for this feature
neev:draft.context: Use this command when you need to create a new blueprint

neev:handoff.name: handoff
neev:handoff.prompt: Prepare the context for handoff to an AI agent
neev:handoff.context: Use this command when you need to format context for ai handoff

neev:inspect.name: inspect
neev:inspect.description: Analyze project structure and find gaps
neev:inspect.prompt: Analyze the project structure and show me any gaps
neev:inspect.context: Use this command when you need to analyze project structure and find gaps

neev:openapi.name: openapi
neev:openapi.prompt: Generate an OpenAPI specification for this blueprint
neev:openapi.context: Use this command when you need to generate openapi specification
